snippet: A six-part video series about the role of women in the Arab Spring, and free teaching resources for using them in the classroom. Does your organization, school, church, club or youth program teach with The Times? Let us know.

headline.main: Activists for Change: Six Short Films and Teaching Resources on Women’s Roles in the Arab Spring
